title: Local Regulation of Coastal Erosion Hazard Areas
content:
Local Regulation of Coastal Erosion Hazard Areas

State Regulations
§ 505.16 - Submission of local programs
§ 505.17 - Minimum standards for certification of local programs
§ 505.18 - Amendments to approved local programs
§ 505.19 - Department monitoring of local programs

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
